review: I AM EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED WITH THIS PRODUCT. I PURCHASED IT FOR MY TELEVISION IN MY BEDROOM, BUT IT SIMPLY DOES NOT WORK. I WOULD LIKE TO RETURN IT. PLEASE ADVISE ME AS TO HOW I DO THIS.
author: Angela E. Ryman

review: Works great! Quick easy set up.
author: Maranda Hill

review: Whole lots better than google chrome cast.
author: anthony  vance

review: Amazing indeed no more cable bills. My son is 10 years old and he loves it. What is really great about the Fire TV Stick is for only $99.99 a year I am a Prime member and I have all these special free additional access passes to everything I want----movies!!! (smile)This Fire stick can move from TV to TV and no reprograming and it is better than the Roku stick. I tried that one 1st and Amazon Fire Stick is the best!
author: AMINAH

review: Very good buy I'm enjoying it
author: Kenneth Aaron

review: I'm a little disappointed with the FireStick.  It would be better if there was an internet app, access to Hulu (not just Hulu plus), HBOGO, and Showtime videos.  I already pay for cable (HBO, Showtime) and Netflix.  It would be nice if I didn't have to pay for it all again to watch on the FireStick.
author: Brendan

review: After a small issue with our Prime account when we log the FireStick in. Customer service fitted the issue and the Fire Stick has been great. With a little more practice and getting formiliar with all the setting it will get even better.
author: Harry G. Wood

review: Outstanding product. Works as advertised. Makes Prime even a better value.
author: Dan Erlin

review: Much more user friendly than the Google Chrome Cast
author: Darryl Cowan
